FuncDef: This command configures the allowed range for the VE-id value: locally configured and received in a NLRI. Configuration of a VE-id higher than the value specified in this command is not allowed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the allowed range of [1-value] for the VE-id. The configured value must be bigger than the existing VE-ids. Values-1 to 65535.
